resources.string:
Welcome to Renaissance, the first Cultural and Sports Committee of GEC
 High 5 to continue!

Do you find it difficult to keep still when you hear the beats, the sound of music in the air?
If thumping on the beat interests you, then BEATS - The Dance Society of GEC, is for you!
 BEATS, a proud presentation from Renaissance, the Cultural and Sports Committee of GEC-Delhi will give you the dance floor, the thumping woofers and the craziest beats to dance to!
 Passion for dancing. Love for the beats, and a never ending will to dance, that's what makes every member of BEATS!

Renaissance brings to you, FOOTLIGHT - The Dramatics Society of GEC-D.
 Mimicry, acting, directing, make-up or designing sets; whatever your forte, FOOTLIGHT is the place for you!
 Join the team, act, direct, sing and showcase your talents the way you've always wanted!
 In the words of Alfred Hitchcock "Drama is like life with the dull bits cut out.", so cut out the dull bits, edit the sad parts and play the best moments!
 Join Footlight, now!

Managerial skills, much?
 Think you can handle events responsibly and effectively, well join our Event Management Committee to be a core part of every Renaissance activity.
 Gather your college spirit, be the change!
 Renaissance.

Hold that paint brush, take a palette, fill it up with colors you like and paint your thoughts on canvas!
 Renaissance is proud to present, STROKES - The Fine Arts Society of GEC-D. The paint will flow in a million shades and brushes will paint a river of thoughts.
 Charcoal, water colors, oil paints or even digital art, Strokes welcomes it all. Art is but one true language of the universe.
 Join Strokes!

\t\nDo you fancy yourself the next Shakespeare? Do you believe that the pen is mightier than the sword?\n If so, then Literati is the place where you should be! The literary society of GEC-D, Literati prides itself on being a society of individuals who can wield a pen better than a knight wields his sword.

\tGive yourself a \"pause\", do you sense \"treble\" up ahead (Pun intended)? It\'s time to pick up your choice weapon and ready yourself for the show!\n Octaves-The Music Society of GEC-D. Let there be rock. \\m/

\tSpot something cool? Take a picture! Feel like sending a message? Short films are the way to go!\n FOCUS-The Photography and Movie Making Society of GEC-D will present to you the best opportunities to reveal the photographer within!\n Why are you still reading this? Join now!

\tLike knowing things? Do you feel like you have what it takes to beat everyone else when it comes to knowing stuff?\n Do you think you can come up with questions that can make anyone sweat?\n ILLUMINATI-The Quizzing Society of GEC-D, proudly presented by Renaissance, will test your mettle when it comes to quizzes.

\tRenaissance brings to you ARENA-The Sports Committee of GEC-D. Sweat it out on the field. Be a college hero. \n Love sports? Wanna represent your college in sporting events in Delhi and India? Arena will help you train for the sport of your choice, build a team and break some records!\n

\tIs a computer your best friend? Do binary codes make more sense to you than decimals? Are you an avid coder?\n Errors? Milestones, I say! If your attitude to program bugs is \"See it, squish it!\", well, BIT-STRINGS-The Technical Society of GEC-D is the place where you belong!\n Join, Bit-Strings and unleash your true potential.

Renaissance is the first cultural and sports committee of GEC Delhi.\n Responsible for managing and organising cultural as well as sports events, Renaissance is a group of student volunteers who are working together to improve the quality of various events that are organised by the college.

Join Renaissance, the first Cultural and Sports Committee of GEC Delhi.
Be the change.
Click the button below or scan the QR code, now!
